name: Sneaky Vikings AR
description:
Calling all tower defenders! Protect your kingdom from Sneaky Vikings in this fun tower defence AR game by GBTI Games!

Sneaky Vikings is a minimalist AR tower defence game in which you build towers and defend your villages from Sneaky Vikings!

Get coins by defeating Vikings, upgrade your defence towers and by all means avoid hitting peasants running to your village!

Stop being a couch potato! Play on your phone or tablet in AR! Move around to aim and shoot better!

How to play the game:
Move your mobile device around to aim!
Tap buttons on the bottom right to build or upgrade towers!
Use buttons on the bottom left to shoot Vikings!
When the last Viking is defeated move on to defend another village!
Brace yourself! Bosses are coming!
Save all villages to free your country from Sneaky Vikings once and for all!


Features:
- Simple controls
- Addictive gameplay
- Epic soundtrack
- Immersive AR experience
